description: Generate text using Google Generative AI.

inputs.name: max_output_tokens
inputs.info: The maximum number of tokens to generate.

inputs.name: model_name
inputs.info: The name of the model to use.

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: The Google API Key to use for the Google Generative AI.

inputs.name: top_p
inputs.info: The maximum cumulative probability of tokens to consider when sampling.

inputs.name: temperature
inputs.info: Controls randomness. Lower values are more deterministic, higher values are more creative.

inputs.name: n
inputs.info: Number of chat completions to generate for each prompt. Note that the API may not return the full n completions if duplicates are generated.

inputs.name: top_k
inputs.info: Decode using top-k sampling: consider the set of top_k most probable tokens. Must be positive.

inputs.name: tool_model_enabled
inputs.info: Whether to use the tool model.
